about_the_game:
About This Game

Welcome to Primate Wars, an immersive open-world survival horror experience where primates have risen to dominate the land. In this tense and atmospheric game, you'll navigate a vast and dynamic environment teeming with danger and opportunity.

Key Features:

  • Expansive Open World: Explore diverse biomes, from dense jungles and eerie swamps to abandoned urban landscapes, each filled with unique challenges and secrets.

  • Survival Mechanics: Hunt for essential resources like food and water to sustain yourself. Manage your health by staying warm in frigid areas or cool in scorching regions.

  • Crafting System: Gather materials to craft powerful weapons, tools, and upgrades for your village. Customize your arsenal to suit your playstyle and overcome various threats.

  • Village Building: Develop and upgrade your base of operations. Construct defenses, enhance living quarters, and expand your village to provide safety and support for your character.

  • Dynamic Weather and Day-Night Cycle: Adapt to changing weather conditions and strategize your actions based on the time of day. Nighttime brings increased threats from aggressive primate factions.

  • Intelligent AI Enemies: Encounter various primate factions, each with unique behaviors and strategies. Engage in intense combat or employ stealth tactics to survive.

  • Quests and Storyline: Immerse yourself in a compelling narrative with engaging quests that reveal the origins of the primate uprising and your role in restoring balance.

  • Multiplayer Mode: Team up with friends or other players online to tackle challenges together, build communal villages, and defend against formidable primate hordes.

  • Character Customization: Personalize your character’s appearance, skills, and abilities to create a unique survivor tailored to your preferred gameplay style.

  • Rich Audio-Visual Experience: Enjoy stunning graphics and a haunting soundtrack that enhance the suspenseful and immersive atmosphere of the game.

What to Expect:

In Primate Wars, every decision you make impacts your survival and the fate of your village. Whether you're scavenging for resources, crafting essential gear, or battling hostile primate factions, you'll need to stay vigilant and strategic. The game's open-world design encourages exploration and experimentation, ensuring that each playthrough offers new experiences and challenges.

Prepare yourself for a gripping survival horror adventure where the line between hunter and hunted is constantly shifting. Can you lead your village to safety and reclaim the world from the primate overlords?

content_descriptors.notes:
Extreme Violence: Players will engage in intense combat scenarios involving realistic and graphic depictions of violence against hostile primate factions. This includes melee and ranged weapon usage, as well as environmental destruction during battles.

Survival Horror Themes: The game portrays harrowing survival situations where players must make critical decisions to protect themselves and their village. This includes scenes of scarcity, danger, and the constant threat of attack by primate overlords.

Graphic Imagery: Visuals in the game may include blood, injuries, and the aftermath of violent encounters, contributing to the overall horror atmosphere.

Sensitive Topics:

No Sexual Content: Primate Wars does not include any sexual acts, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, or BDSM themes.

No Drug or Alcohol Abuse: The game does not depict or involve the use of drugs or alcohol.

No Self-Harm: There are no themes or content related to self-harm.

Additional Information:

Intense Atmosphere: The game features a dark and suspenseful environment designed to evoke fear and tension, which may be distressing to some players.

Psychological Horror Elements: Players may experience psychological stressors as they navigate through the hostile open world, enhancing the survival horror experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or macOS version (if applicable)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon RX 560

short_description: The game focuses heavily on the player’s ability to survive in a world where food, water, and ammunition are scarce, and the natural world is now a dangerous place. The evolution of the apes symbolizes the unintended consequences of humanity’s overreach and experimentation.
